duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all job postings for new job orders and coordinate efforts with the marketing team.
Handle all resume submissions to client or client portal system.
Manage scheduling and coordinate interviews directly with client accounts.
Navigate client interview feedback and the offer process on all deals.
Recruit for your own accounts and support the recruitment process for your team’s accounts.
Oversee onboarding of all temporary hires and work with Credentialing team to ensure all compliance requirements are met and target start date is fulfilled.
Conduct and oversee quality checks and performance evaluations with clients for placed candidates.
Help sales team navigate incoming orders and prioritize new requisitions.
Build relationships with hiring managers and generate new business from existing accounts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
